name: Curiostiy Killed the Cat
description:
This is a Two Player Game!!!

READ INSTRUCTIONS HERE (because it's not finalized yet)

please use 2560 x 1600 for best results

Controls

Player 1 (cat):WASD to move Cat, HBNM to move camera ( I know it's weird, if I had joystick controllers, that'd be ideal)

Player 2:(rover): Arrow Keys to move Rover, Mouse to move camera, Click to shoot

Instructions:

Cat: eat 3 cat foods (little grey cylinders that light up when you stand on it) without getting shot by Curiosity. To eat, stay on the cat food for 5 seconds until the light turns green.

Curiosity: shoot the cat! but remember, you're bullets can hurt you too.  What goes around, comes around.
